Parameters.description: Parameters for the EAT_FROM operation. Consumes a single serving from a food item, tracking servings and managing consumed state transitions.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor eating from the food item

foodEntity.description: Entity ID of the food item being consumed from

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string, servingsConsumed?: number, flavorText?: string}
